_header: Saint James the holy Apostle good is to have in mone
Subjects: saints’ lives; James the Great, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. James the Great in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Iame þe apostel riȝt is to habbe In moneSeynt Iones
                    broþer þe euangelist & godes aunte sone…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou seynt Iame uor þe holi stude þat þu hast in
                    galisHelp ous & alle þine pilgrims & bring ous to heuene
                    blis

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Iem þe holy Apostel riht is to habben in moneSeint Iones
                    broþer þe Ewangelyst and Godus aunte sone…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Mony men for þulke Miracle seint Iem loueþ þe
                    moreNou bidde we vr lord seint Iem þat he us ȝiue milce and ore.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoetd200.First Lines:
…Þes wer lo wondir broþeryn mo suche nie may
                    findenou swikedom geþ†nou wel ver vorþ & triwenesse al by
                    hynde…
BodEngPoetd200.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Iame vor þe holy stede þat þou hast in
                    galisHelpe vs & alle pilgrime & bringe vs to heuene
                    blis

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Iemes þe holi Apostle guod is to habbe in moneSeint
                    Iohanes broþur þe Ewangelist and ore louerdes aunte
                    sone…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þat he for þat holie stude þat he hath in
                    galiȝHelpe us and alle is pilgrimes and bringue us to heouene
                    blis
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 33-45.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Iame þe gode man right is to haue in moneSeint Iones
                    broþer þe euangelist godes aunte sone…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou seint Iame for þe holy stede þat þu hast in
                    Galiȝhelp alle þi pilgrims & vs & bring vs to heuene
                    blisse
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Seynt Iame þe holy apostel ryt it is to hauen in myndeHe was
                    seynt Ionis brothir þe wangelist & goddes aunte sone ner of
                    kynde…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þe kyng tok hem anon & to strong prison hem
                    brouȝtteOur lord ihesu for gat hem nouȝt but hastely on hem he
                    þouȝtte
BodRawPoe225.Attributed Title:
De sancto Iacobo aplotolo moior (f. 45); Explicit vita beati
                        Iacobi apostoli maioris (f. 49v)

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayn Jame þat broþer was to Jon þe
                    euangelysteApostel he was & avut son vnto ihesu cristeHis modre
                    was our lady sistre Marie CleopheOf goddeȝ kynne he was neghe þe
                    better myght he be…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Nou sayne Iame þat worthely in Galieȝ biried
                    isBringe vs & þi pilgrimeȝ al vnto heuen blis

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Iame þe gode apostel riȝt is to habbe in moneSein
                    Iones broþer þe wangelist & godes aunte sone…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou sein Iame for þe holy stude þat þai hast in
                    galisHelpe us and al þine pilgrims & bring us to heuene
                    blis
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.327-40.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Iame þe goede apostel riȝt is to haue in moneSeint
                    Iones broþer þe Ewangelist and cristes aunte sone…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now Seint Iame ffor þe holy stede þat þou hast in
                    GalysHelp vs and alle þine pilgrimes and bring vs to heuene
                    blys

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint Jeme þe goud apostle ryȝt ys to habbe in moneseint
                    Jonys broþer þe ewangelyste & godes aunte sone…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Many men for þat myracle seint Jeme loueþ þe
                    moreNow bydde we seint Jeme ȝerne þat he ous schelde fram
                    sore
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEyn Iame þe gode apostel riȝt is to haue in moneSeyn
                    Iones broþer þe ewangelist & godes ante sone…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou sein Iame for þe holy stude þat þou hast in
                    galishelp vs & alle þine pilegrims & bringe vs to heuene
                    blis
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Iacobo (f. 140v, by scribe in margin beside
                    first line); Iacobo (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Iame þe apostil riȝt is to haue in moneseint Iones broþer þe euangelist & godes aunte sone…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou sein Iame [   ] for þe holi stude þat þu hast in galhelpe ous & alle þin pilgrims & bring ous to heuen blis
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 114v); erasure in penultimate line.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Iame þe gode man riȝt is to habbe in moneSeint Johnes broþer þe wangelist godes aunte sone…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou Seint Iame for þe holi stede þat þu hast in GalizHel alle þi pelegrims & ous & bring ous to heuene blis

Lam223.First Lines:
Saynt Iame þe holy apostle riȝt s to haue in moneSaynt
                    Iones broþer þe euangelist & goddes aunte sone…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Mony men for þat he of carf euer he did amysseNow pray
                    we Saynt Iame þat he vs shylde fro sore Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Iames þe appostel right is to haue in wonneSeynt Iohnes
                    broþer þe Euaungelist and goddis awnte sone…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Seynt Iame for þe holy place þat þow hast in
                    GalysHele vs and alle þi pilgrymes and bryng to heuene blysse.
                    Amen.
